definition: supporting role (in play, film etc)/minor role/to play a secondary role (in business etc)/to play second fiddle
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
surname Jue
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I have been a walk-on for two years and haven't got a real character.
sentences.chinese: 我演配角两年了，一直没得到个真正的角色。

sentences.english: Congratulations on winning 2009 Taipei Golden Horse for Best Supporting Actress.
sentences.chinese: 恭喜红姐姐，夺得2009金马奖最佳女配角。

sentences.english: Her performance earned her an Academy Award nomination, for best supporting actress.
sentences.chinese: 她的表演为她赢得了一个奥斯卡最佳女配角的提名。

sentences.english: I just like the sky star, from beginning to end is a supporting role, background.
sentences.chinese: 我就像满天星，从头到尾都是配角，背景。

sentences.english: The actress won an Academy Award as Best Supporting Actress for her performance.
sentences.chinese: 女演员以她的表现获得了奥斯卡奖的最佳女配角。

sentences.english: For decades, the television was the flagship of any consumer-electronics product line-up.
sentences.chinese: 几十年来，电视机一直是消费类电子产品中的配角。

sentences.english: In the beginning I had this feeling that it was a secondary instrument.
sentences.chinese: 刚入道的时候，我也觉得口琴只是个配角乐器。

sentences.english: My life was chaotic, I was not clear lead and supporting roles.
sentences.chinese: 我的生活乱得可以，我早已分不清楚主角与配角。

sentences.english: He just is a second banana in that burlesque.
sentences.chinese: 他只不过是那场滑稽戏里的配角。

sentences.english: I just want to be a tiny supporting actor beside you.
sentences.chinese: 我只想做你身边的一个微不足道的小配角。

sentences.english: She won an Oscar nomination for best supporting actress.
sentences.chinese: 她获得奥斯卡奖最隹女配角的提名。

sentences.english: He has stooged for me for 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 他给我做配角已有10年了。

sentences.english: Your job as a supporting actor is to play np to the leading character.
sentences.chinese: 作为配角演员，你的任务就是给主要演员当配角。

sentences.english: Your job as a supporting actor is to play np to the leading character.
sentences.chinese: 作为配角演员，你的任务就是给主要演员当配角。

sentences.english: Jacky Cheung got the Best Actor Award at India Movie Festival.
sentences.chinese: 此外，最佳男配角黄秋生也因故没有参颁奖。

sentences.english: We’re going to give awards for Best Supporting Theologian in a Musical Role.
sentences.chinese: 我们将为最佳音乐配角神学家颁奖。

to play a small role
costume of minor characters in opera, featuring dragon designs/walk-on
role/character in a novel/persona/also pr. [jiao3 se4]
scene (in a movie etc)/one's part in a movie or play/(archaic) actor's payment
villain (of a drama etc)
to buy soy sauce/it's none of my business ("I’m just here to buy some soy sauce")
actor or actress/performer/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
to enhance by contrast/to set off/to serve as a background in order to bring out the subject with greater brilliance/to serve as a prop/a foil
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
(dialect) veteran actor/old trouper
to appear on stage in an amateur capacity/(of a professional) to make a guest appearance/(fig.) to assume a role outside one's usual duties/to substitute for
to play the role of/to act
acting/performing skills
negative character/bad guy (in a story)
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
